subjects.title: Mathematics
subjects.description: Master mathematical concepts and problem-solving for Secondary 1
subjects.description_zh: 掌握中一数学概念和解题技巧

chapters.title: Integers & Rational Numbers
chapters.description: Learn integer operations and rational number representations
chapters.description_zh: 学习整数运算和有理数表示
objectives: Understand integer operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
Represent rational numbers on the number line
Convert between fractions, decimals and percentages
objectives_zh: 理解整数运算（加、减、乘、除）
在分数、小数和百分数之间转换

sections.title: Introduction to Integers
sections.content: Integers include all positive numbers, negative numbers, and zero. They extend our number system beyond just counting numbers.
sections.content_zh: 整数包括所有正数、负数和零。它们将我们的数字系统扩展到计数以外。

sections.title: Number Line Visualization
sections.content: NumberLineReveal

sections.title: Rational Numbers as Fractions
sections.content: FractionVisual

exercises.prompt: What is (-7) + 12?
exercises.hint: Add 12 to -7. Think of moving right 12 spaces on the number line from -7.
exercises.hint_zh: 将12加到-7。想象在数轴上从-7向右移动12个位置。

exercises.prompt: Express 0.75 as a fraction in simplest form.
exercises.prompt_zh: 将0.75表示为最简分数形式。
exercises.hint: 0.75 = 75/100. Simplify by dividing both by 25.
exercises.hint_zh: 0.75 = 75/100。将分子和分母都除以25来简化。

chapters.title: Factors, Multiples & Prime Numbers
chapters.description: Understand factors, multiples, HCF, LCM and prime factorization
chapters.description_zh: 理解因数、倍数、最大公因数、最小公倍数和质因数分解
objectives: Find factors and multiples of numbers
objectives_zh: 找出数字的因数和倍数
计算最大公因数和最小公倍数

sections.title: Factors and Multiples
sections.content: A factor divides a number exactly. A multiple is the product of a number and any integer. For example, factors of 12 are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12. Multiples of 3 are 3, 6, 9, 12, ...
sections.content_zh: 因数是能整除某数的数。倍数是一个数与任何整数的乘积。例如，12的因数是1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12。3的倍数是3, 6, 9, 12, ...

exercises.prompt: Which of the following is a prime number?
exercises.hint: A prime number has exactly 2 factors: 1 and itself.
exercises.hint_zh: 质数只有两个因数：1和它本身。

chapters.title: Approximations & Estimations
chapters.description: Learn rounding, significant figures, and estimation techniques
chapters.description_zh: 学习四舍五入、有效数字和估算技巧
objectives_zh: 将数字四舍五入到最接近的10、100、1000

sections.title: Rounding and Significant Figures
sections.content: Rounding simplifies numbers while keeping them close to the original value. Significant figures show the precision of a measurement.
sections.content_zh: 四舍五入简化数字，同时保持它们接近原始值。有效数字显示测量的精度。

exercises.prompt: Round 3.876 to 2 significant figures.
exercises.prompt_zh: 将3.876四舍五入到2位有效数字。
exercises.hint: Count from the first non-zero digit.
exercises.hint_zh: 从第一个非零数字开始计数。

chapters.title: Algebraic Expressions
chapters.description: Master simplification, expansion, and factorization of algebraic expressions
chapters.description_zh: 掌握代数表达式的简化、展开和因式分解
objectives: Combine like terms to simplify expressions
Expand brackets using the distributive law
objectives_zh: 合并同类项以简化表达式
因式分解简单的代数表达式
通过代入求值代数表达式

sections.title: Introduction to Algebraic Expressions
sections.content: An algebraic expression uses letters (variables) to represent unknown numbers. Examples: 2x + 3, 5a - 2b. Key Terms: VARIABLE (a letter representing a number), COEFFICIENT (number multiplied by variable), CONSTANT (number on its own), TERM (parts separated by + or -). Why use algebra? To write general rules, solve problems with unknowns, and describe patterns.
sections.content_zh: 代数表达式使用字母（变量）来表示未知数。例子：2x + 3，5a - 2b。关键术语：变量（表示数字的字母）、系数（与变量相乘的数字）、常数（单独的数字）、项（用+或-分隔的部分）。为什么使用代数？编写一般规则，解决未知数问题，描述模式。

sections.title: Like Terms
sections.content: LIKE TERMS have the same variables raised to the same powers. Only like terms can be combined. Examples: 2x and 5x are like terms. 4x and 5x² are NOT like terms (different powers). Combining: 3x + 5x = 8x (add coefficients). Rule: Add or subtract coefficients, keep variable part same.
sections.content_zh: 同类项具有相同的变量和相同的幂。只有同类项可以合并。例子：2x和5x是同类项。4x和5x²不是同类项（不同幂次）。合并：3x + 5x = 8x（加系数）。规则：对系数进行加减，变量部分保持不变。

sections.title: Visualizing Like Terms
sections.content: TileCombine

sections.title: Simplifying Expressions
sections.content: Simplifying means combining like terms. Steps: 1) Identify like terms, 2) Combine coefficients, 3) Write in standard form. Example: 5x + 3 - 2x + 7. Group: (5x - 2x) + (3 + 7) = 3x + 10. Common mistakes: Don't combine unlike terms (2x + 3y is NOT 5xy), Don't change variables (2x + 3x = 5x, NOT 5x²).
sections.content_zh: 简化意味着合并同类项。步骤：1）识别同类项，2）合并系数，3）写成标准形式。例子：5x + 3 - 2x + 7。分组：(5x - 2x) + (3 + 7) = 3x + 10。常见错误：不要合并不同类项（2x + 3y不是5xy），不要改变变量（2x + 3x = 5x，不是5x²）。

sections.title: Expanding Brackets
sections.content: a(b + c) = ab + ac
sections.explanation: DISTRIBUTIVE LAW: Multiply outside term by EACH term inside. Example: 3(x + 2) = 3×x + 3×2 = 3x + 6. With negatives: -2(x + 4) = -2x - 8. Remember: The sign outside affects ALL terms inside!
sections.explanation_zh: 分配律：将括号外的项乘以括号内的每一项。例子：3(x + 2) = 3×x + 3×2 = 3x + 6。负数：-2(x + 4) = -2x - 8。记住：外面的符号影响里面所有的项！

sections.title: Factorizing Expressions
sections.content: Factorizing is REVERSE of expanding - take out common factors. Steps: 1) Find HCF of all terms, 2) Write HCF outside brackets, 3) Divide each term by HCF, 4) Check by expanding. Example: 6x + 9. HCF = 3. Answer: 3(2x + 3). Check: 3(2x + 3) = 6x + 9.
sections.content_zh: 因式分解是展开的逆过程 - 提取公因数。步骤：1）找出所有项的最大公因数，2）将HCF写在括号外，3）每项除以HCF，4）通过展开检查。例子：6x + 9。HCF = 3。答案：3(2x + 3)。检查：3(2x + 3) = 6x + 9。

sections.title: Substitution and Evaluation
sections.content: Substitution means replacing variables with numbers. Steps: 1) Write expression, 2) Replace variables (use brackets!), 3) Follow order of operations, 4) Calculate. Example: Evaluate 3x + 5 when x = 4. Answer: 3(4) + 5 = 12 + 5 = 17. Always use brackets for negative numbers!
sections.content_zh: 代入意味着用数字替换变量。步骤：1）写表达式，2）替换变量（使用括号！），3）遵循运算顺序，4）计算。例子：当x = 4时求值3x + 5。答案：3(4) + 5 = 12 + 5 = 17。负数时始终使用括号！

sections.title: Real-World Applications
sections.content: Algebra helps solve real problems. Examples: Perimeter of rectangle P = 2(l + w). Cost calculation: Total = price × quantity. Temperature conversion: F = (9/5)C + 32. Distance: d = speed × time. Discount: Sale price = Original × (1 - discount%). Algebra lets us write formulas once and use for any values!
sections.content_zh: 代数帮助解决实际问题。例子：矩形周长P = 2(l + w)。成本计算：总计 = 价格 × 数量。温度转换：F = (9/5)C + 32。距离：d = 速度 × 时间。折扣：售价 = 原价 × (1 - 折扣%)。代数让我们可以写一次公式，然后用于任何值！

exercises.prompt: Which of the following are like terms?
exercises.hint: Like terms have the same variable(s) with the same power.
exercises.hint_zh: 同类项具有相同的变量和相同的幂。

exercises.prompt: Simplify: 4x + 2y - 3x + y
exercises.hint: Group x terms and y terms separately.
exercises.hint_zh: 分别分组x项和y项。

exercises.prompt: Expand: 3(x + 2)
exercises.hint: Multiply 3 by both terms inside.
exercises.hint_zh: 将3与括号内的两项相乘。

exercises.prompt: Expand: 5(2a - 3)
exercises.hint: Multiply 5 by each term.
exercises.hint_zh: 将5与每项相乘。

exercises.prompt: Factorize: 6x + 9
exercises.hint: Find HCF of 6 and 9.
exercises.hint_zh: 找6和9的最大公因数。

exercises.prompt: Evaluate 3x + 5 when x = 4
exercises.hint: Substitute 4 for x: 3(4) + 5

chapters.title: Simple Linear Equations
chapters.description: Solve linear equations with one variable
chapters.description_zh: 求解单变量线性方程
objectives: Solve equations of the form ax + b = c
objectives_zh: 求解形式为ax + b = c的方程

sections.title: What is an Equation?
sections.content: An equation shows that two expressions are equal. To solve it, isolate the variable by performing the same operation on both sides.
sections.content_zh: 方程表明两个表达式相等。要求解它，通过在两边执行相同的运算来隔离变量。

sections.title: Equation Balance
sections.content: EquationBalance

exercises.prompt: Solve: 2x + 5 = 13
exercises.hint: First subtract 5 from both sides, then divide by 2.
exercises.hint_zh: 首先从两边减去5，然后除以2。

chapters.title: Ratio, Rate & Proportion
chapters.description: Understand relationships between quantities
chapters.description_zh: 理解量之间的关系

sections.title: Understanding Ratios
sections.content: A ratio compares two or more quantities. For example, if there are 3 boys and 2 girls, the ratio is 3:2.
sections.content_zh: 比比较两个或多个量。例如，如果有3个男孩和2个女孩，比是3:2。

exercises.prompt: Simplify the ratio 12:18
exercises.hint: Divide both numbers by their HCF.
exercises.hint_zh: 将两个数都除以它们的最大公因数。

chapters.title: Percentage Applications
chapters.description: Calculate percentage increase, decrease, GST and discounts
chapters.description_zh: 计算百分比增减、消费税和折扣

sections.title: Percentage Basics
sections.content: Percentage means 'per hundred'. To find x% of a number, multiply by x/100. For example, 25% of 80 = 80 × 25/100 = 20.
sections.content_zh: 百分比意思是'每百'。要找出某数的x%，乘以x/100。例如，80的25% = 80 × 25/100 = 20。

exercises.prompt: A $200 item is discounted by 15%. What is the sale price?
exercises.prompt_zh: 一件200元的商品打85折。售价是多少？

chapters.title: Patterns & Sequences
chapters.description: Recognize patterns and find the nth term
chapters.description_zh: 识别模式并找出第n项

sections.title: Arithmetic Sequences
sections.content: An arithmetic sequence has a constant difference between consecutive terms. For example: 2, 5, 8, 11, ... has common difference 3.
sections.content_zh: 等差数列的连续项之间有恒定的差。例如：2, 5, 8, 11, ...的公差是3。

exercises.prompt: Find the 10th term of the sequence: 3, 7, 11, 15, ...
exercises.hint: Common difference is 4. Use formula: a_n = a_1 + (n-1)d
exercises.hint_zh: 公差是4。使用公式：a_n = a_1 + (n-1)d

chapters.title: Coordinates & Linear Graphs
chapters.description: Plot points and graph linear functions
chapters.description_zh: 绘制点和线性函数图
objectives: Graph linear functions y = mx + c
objectives_zh: 绘制线性函数y = mx + c

sections.title: Coordinate System
sections.content: The coordinate plane has two axes: horizontal x-axis and vertical y-axis. Every point is identified by (x, y) coordinates.
sections.content_zh: 坐标平面有两个轴：水平的x轴和垂直的y轴。每个点由(x, y)坐标标识。

exercises.prompt: What is the gradient of the line y = 3x + 2?
exercises.hint: In y = mx + c, m is the gradient.
exercises.hint_zh: 在y = mx + c中，m是斜率。

chapters.title: Simple Inequalities
chapters.description: Solve and represent inequalities
chapters.description_zh: 求解和表示不等式

sections.title: Understanding Inequalities
sections.content: An inequality shows that one value is greater or less than another. For example, x > 3 means x is greater than 3.
sections.content_zh: 不等式表明一个值大于或小于另一个值。例如，x > 3表示x大于3。

exercises.prompt: Solve: 2x + 3 < 11
exercises.hint: Solve like an equation, but keep the inequality sign.
exercises.hint_zh: 像方程一样求解，但保留不等式符号。

chapters.title: Angles & Basic Geometry
chapters.description: Understand angle properties and relationships
chapters.description_zh: 理解角的性质和关系
objectives: Identify angle types (acute, obtuse, right, reflex)
Calculate angles on a straight line and at a point
objectives_zh: 识别角的类型（锐角、钝角、直角、优角）
计算直线上和一点处的角

sections.title: Types of Angles
sections.content: Angles are measured in degrees. A right angle is 90°, acute angles are less than 90°, obtuse angles are between 90° and 180°.
sections.content_zh: 角以度为单位测量。直角是90°，锐角小于90°，钝角在90°和180°之间。

exercises.prompt: If two angles on a straight line are 110° and x°, find x.
exercises.prompt_zh: 如果直线上的两个角是110°和x°，求x。
exercises.hint: Angles on a straight line add up to 180°.
exercises.hint_zh: 直线上的角加起来等于180°。

chapters.title: Triangles & Polygons
chapters.description: Properties of triangles, quadrilaterals and polygons
chapters.description_zh: 三角形、四边形和多边形的性质

sections.title: Triangle Angle Sum
sections.content: The sum of angles in any triangle is always 180°. This fundamental property helps solve many geometry problems.
sections.content_zh: 任何三角形的内角和总是180°。这个基本性质有助于解决许多几何问题。

exercises.prompt: Two angles in a triangle are 50° and 70°. Find the third angle.
exercises.prompt_zh: 三角形中的两个角是50°和70°。求第三个角。
exercises.hint: Use angle sum property: angles add up to 180°.
exercises.hint_zh: 使用内角和性质：角加起来等于180°。

chapters.title: Perimeter & Area
chapters.description: Calculate perimeter and area of plane figures
chapters.description_zh: 计算平面图形的周长和面积
objectives: Find perimeter of rectangles, triangles, circles
Calculate area of squares, rectangles, triangles
objectives_zh: 求矩形、三角形、圆的周长
计算正方形、矩形、三角形的面积

sections.title: Basic Formulas
sections.content: Rectangle: Area = length × width, Perimeter = 2(length + width). Triangle: Area = ½ × base × height. Circle: Area = πr², Circumference = 2πr.
sections.content_zh: 矩形：面积 = 长 × 宽，周长 = 2(长 + 宽)。三角形：面积 = ½ × 底 × 高。圆：面积 = πr²，周长 = 2πr。

exercises.prompt: Find the area of a rectangle with length 8 cm and width 5 cm.
exercises.prompt_zh: 求长8厘米宽5厘米的矩形的面积。
exercises.hint: Area = length × width.
exercises.hint_zh: 面积 = 长 × 宽。

chapters.title: Statistics & Data Analysis
chapters.description: Interpret charts, graphs and calculate averages
chapters.description_zh: 解释图表并计算平均值
objectives: Read and create bar charts, pie charts
objectives_zh: 读取和创建条形图、饼图
计算平均数、中位数、众数

sections.title: Measures of Central Tendency
sections.content: Mean is the average (sum ÷ count). Median is the middle value when data is ordered. Mode is the most frequent value.
sections.content_zh: 平均数是平均值（总和÷个数）。中位数是数据排序后的中间值。众数是出现最频繁的值。

exercises.prompt: Find the mean of: 5, 8, 12, 15, 20
exercises.hint: Add all numbers and divide by 5.
exercises.hint_zh: 将所有数字相加并除以5。

subjects.title: Science
subjects.description: Explore Physics, Chemistry and Biology for Secondary 1
subjects.description_zh: 探索中一物理、化学和生物学

chapters.title: Scientific Methods & Measurement
chapters.description: Learn the nature of science and proper measurement techniques
chapters.description_zh: 学习科学的本质和正确的测量技术

sections.title: Laboratory Safety
sections.content: Always wear safety goggles, tie back long hair, no food or drink in the lab, and report accidents immediately to your teacher.
sections.content_zh: 始终佩戴安全护目镜，束起长发，实验室内禁止饮食，发生事故立即向老师报告。

sections.title: SI Base Units
sections.content: The seven SI base units are: meter (m) for length, kilogram (kg) for mass, second (s) for time, ampere (A) for current, kelvin (K) for temperature, mole (mol) for amount, and candela (cd) for light intensity.
sections.content_zh: 七个国际单位制基本单位是：米(m)表示长度、千克(kg)表示质量、秒(s)表示时间、安培(A)表示电流、开尔文(K)表示温度、摩尔(mol)表示物质的量、坎德拉(cd)表示光强度。

exercises.prompt: What is the SI unit for temperature?
exercises.prompt_zh: 温度的国际单位制单位是什么？
exercises.hint: Think about absolute temperature scale.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想绝对温度标度。

exercises.prompt: Convert 2.5 kg to grams.

chapters.title: Particulate Model of Matter
chapters.description: Understand how particles behave in different states of matter
chapters.description_zh: 理解粒子在不同物质状态中的行为
objectives: Describe particle arrangement in solids, liquids, and gases
objectives_zh: 描述固体、液体和气体中的粒子排列
将粒子运动与温度联系起来

sections.title: States of Matter
sections.content: ParticlesInStates

sections.title: Diffusion
sections.content: Random motion of particles leads to mixing without stirring. Particles move from high to low concentration. Diffusion is faster at higher temperatures.
sections.content_zh: 粒子的随机运动导致不需搅拌就能混合。粒子从高浓度区域移动到低浓度区域。温度越高扩散越快。

exercises.prompt: In solids, particles mainly...
choices: are fixed in position and vibrate
are far apart with weak forces
move very rapidly in all directions
exercises.hint: Think about the structure and movement in solids.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想固体的结构和运动。

chapters.title: Mixtures & Separation Techniques
chapters.description: Distinguish pure substances from mixtures and learn separation methods
chapters.description_zh: 区分纯净物和混合物，学习分离方法
objectives_zh: 区分元素、化合物和混合物

sections.title: Pure Substances vs Mixtures
sections.content: A pure substance has a fixed composition and properties. A mixture contains two or more substances that can be physically separated.
sections.content_zh: 纯净物具有固定的组成和性质。混合物含有两种或多种可以物理分离的物质。

exercises.prompt: Which method separates salt from sand?
exercises.prompt_zh: 哪种方法可以从沙子中分离盐？
exercises.hint: First separate sand, then recover salt from water.
exercises.hint_zh: 先分离沙子，然后从水中回收盐。

chapters.title: Structure & Functions of Cells
chapters.description: Explore the basic unit of life and cell structures
chapters.description_zh: 探索生命的基本单位和细胞结构
objectives: Identify cell structures and their functions
objectives_zh: 识别细胞结构及其功能
比较植物细胞和动物细胞

sections.title: The Cell
sections.content: Cells are the basic units of life. All living organisms are made of cells. Plant cells have cell walls and chloroplasts, while animal cells do not.
sections.content_zh: 细胞是生命的基本单位。所有生物都由细胞组成。植物细胞有细胞壁和叶绿体，而动物细胞没有。

exercises.prompt: Which structures are found ONLY in plant cells?
exercises.prompt_zh: 哪些结构只存在于植物细胞中？
exercises.hint: Think about photosynthesis and structural support.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想光合作用和结构支持。

chapters.title: Light & Reflection
chapters.description: Study the ray model of light, reflection and refraction
chapters.description_zh: 研究光的射线模型、反射和折射
objectives: Understand the ray model of light

sections.title: Properties of Light
sections.content: Light travels in straight lines. When light hits a surface, it can be reflected, absorbed, or transmitted. The angle of incidence equals the angle of reflection.
sections.content_zh: 光沿直线传播。当光照射到表面时，可以被反射、吸收或透射。入射角等于反射角。

exercises.prompt: If light hits a mirror at 30° to the normal, what is the angle of reflection?
exercises.prompt_zh: 如果光以与法线成30°的角度照射到镜子上，反射角是多少？
exercises.hint: Law of reflection: angle of incidence = angle of reflection.
exercises.hint_zh: 反射定律：入射角 = 反射角。

chapters.title: Heat & Temperature
chapters.description: Understand heat transfer mechanisms
chapters.description_zh: 理解热传递机制

sections.title: Heat vs Temperature
sections.content: Temperature measures how hot or cold something is. Heat is thermal energy that flows from hot to cold objects. Heat transfer occurs through conduction, convection, and radiation.
sections.content_zh: 温度测量物体的冷热程度。热是从热物体流向冷物体的热能。热传递通过传导、对流和辐射发生。

exercises.prompt: Match heat transfer methods with examples:
exercises.prompt_zh: 将热传递方法与例子匹配：

chapters.title: Forces and Motion
chapters.description: Explore forces, friction, balanced and unbalanced forces with interactive simulations
chapters.description_zh: 通过互动模拟探索力、摩擦力、平衡力和不平衡力
objectives: Understand what forces are and how they affect motion
Identify and measure forces using spring balances
Distinguish between balanced and unbalanced forces
Apply Newton's First Law of Motion
objectives_zh: 理解什么是力以及它们如何影响运动
使用弹簧秤识别和测量力
区分平衡力和不平衡力
应用牛顿第一运动定律

sections.title: What is a Force?
sections.content: A force is a push or pull. Forces can change the shape, speed, or direction of an object. The unit of force is the Newton (N).
sections.content_zh: 力是推或拉。力可以改变物体的形状、速度或方向。力的单位是牛顿（N）。

sections.title: Forces and Motion Simulation
sections.content: ForceMotion

exercises.prompt: When forces are balanced, the object will...
choices: remain stationary or move at constant velocity
exercises.hint: Think about Newton's First Law.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想牛顿第一定律。

chapters.title: Digestive System
chapters.description: Learn about human digestion and nutrient absorption
chapters.description_zh: 学习人体消化和营养吸收
objectives: Identify parts of the digestive system
objectives_zh: 理解机械消化和化学消化

sections.title: The Digestive Process
sections.content: Digestion breaks down food into smaller molecules that can be absorbed. It involves both mechanical (chewing, churning) and chemical (enzymes) processes.
sections.content_zh: 消化将食物分解成可以被吸收的较小分子。它涉及机械（咀嚼、搅拌）和化学（酶）过程。

exercises.prompt: Arrange the digestive organs in the correct order of food passage:
exercises.prompt_zh: 按食物通过的正确顺序排列消化器官：

chapters.title: Respiratory System
chapters.description: Understand breathing and gas exchange
chapters.description_zh: 理解呼吸和气体交换
objectives: Identify parts of the respiratory system
objectives_zh: 理解肺泡中的气体交换

sections.title: Breathing and Gas Exchange
sections.content: The respiratory system brings oxygen into the body and removes carbon dioxide. Gas exchange occurs in tiny air sacs called alveoli in the lungs.
sections.content_zh: 呼吸系统将氧气带入体内并排出二氧化碳。气体交换发生在肺部称为肺泡的微小气囊中。

exercises.prompt: Where does gas exchange occur in the lungs?
exercises.prompt_zh: 肺部的气体交换发生在哪里？
exercises.hint: Think about the tiny air sacs with thin walls.
exercises.hint_zh: 想想有薄壁的微小气囊。

chapters.title: Circulatory System
chapters.description: Learn about the heart and blood circulation
chapters.description_zh: 学习心脏和血液循环
objectives: Explain the role of blood components
objectives_zh: 区分动脉、静脉和毛细血管

sections.title: The Heart and Blood Vessels
sections.content: The heart pumps blood around the body through blood vessels. Arteries carry blood away from the heart, veins carry blood to the heart, and capillaries allow exchange of materials.
sections.content_zh: 心脏通过血管将血液泵送到全身。动脉将血液从心脏输出，静脉将血液送回心脏，毛细血管允许物质交换。

exercises.prompt: Which blood vessels have the thickest walls?
exercises.hint: These vessels carry blood at high pressure from the heart.
exercises.hint_zh: 这些血管以高压从心脏输送血液。

chapters.title: Human Reproduction
chapters.description: Introduction to human reproductive system
chapters.description_zh: 人类生殖系统简介
objectives: Identify male and female reproductive organs
objectives_zh: 识别男性和女性生殖器官

sections.title: Reproduction Basics
sections.content: Reproduction is the biological process by which new organisms are produced. In humans, this involves the fusion of male and female gametes (sex cells).
sections.content_zh: 生殖是产生新生物的生物过程。在人类中，这涉及男性和女性配子（性细胞）的融合。

exercises.prompt: What is the male gamete called?
exercises.hint: It's the smaller, mobile sex cell.
exercises.hint_zh: 它是较小的、可移动的性细胞。
